data.text: @TheTPatriots e-levy will bring the seat of God to Gh.

@TheTPatriots No reasonable gov will give its national Airport to private entity to run covid tests whilst the state can equally do so, the private company takes away all monies made at the airport and then u turn arnd to tell me the country broke so u need E-levy, this makes u a useless gov..

@TheTPatriots Why y'all dey figure we no get sense for this country... every single person already pays tax on every transaction... that is why we pay VAT.... cancel the VAT and you'll have a solid argument
@AbdulRahimLee3 @TheTPatriots What do u think VAT is?
@TheTPatriots Only 10% of our population pay taxes. It's not appropriate as citizens
